data.text: God, you are the one whom I praise,
because wicked people slander me
They are constantly saying that they hate me,
I show them that I want to be their friends
In return for my doing good things for them and loving them,
They said, “Appoint a wicked judge who will judge him,
And cause that when the trial ends,
Then, cause that he will soon die
Cause that his children will not have a father any more
Cause that his children will be forced to leave the ruined homes that they have been living in
Cause that all the people to whom he owed money will seize all his property;
Cause that while he is still living no one will be kind to him,
Cause that all his descendants will die
Yahweh, remember and do not forgive his ancestors for the evil things that they did,
think about his sins continually,
He never was kind to anyone;
He liked to curse people.
He cursed other people as often/easily as he put on his clothes [SIM];
Cause that those terrible things will cling to him like his clothes
Yahweh, I want you to punish all my enemies that way,
But Yahweh, my God, do good things for me
I ask you to do this because I am poor and needy
I think that my time to remain alive is short,
My knees are weak because I have ◄fasted/abstained from eating food► very often,
The people who accuse me make fun of me;
Yahweh, my God, help me!
When you save me,
They may curse me, but I ask that you bless me.
Cause those who accuse me to be completely disgraced;
But I will thank Yahweh very greatly;
I will do that because he defends [MTY] needy people like me,
